Son Goku for Constable!

Son Goku

He's SUPER!

Elect me for Fayette County District 3!

My promises to you.

Upon election, I WILL solve these problems!

  • Find the Dragon Balls!
  • No more villians!
  • Anime hair for everyone!

Who is Son Goku?

He is super!

I am Son Goku, but please just call me Goku. I have trained in martial arts since I was a young boy. Because I train my body and inner energy, Ki, daily, I am the strongest man on the planet Earth!

If elected Constable for District 3 of Fayette County, my promises to you are simple. I WILL find the wish granting Dragon Balls and use them to benefit everyone! No need to serve evictions!

We will come together as a community and destroy all vilians! You are safe with me. I can fly, focus my Ki inter energy blasts, and crush rocks with my bare hands.

Everyone knows the 3rd best part of anime is the hair. Well District 3, if elected I will make sure anime hair is the 1st best part of living in Disctrict 3!


My family

They're super too!

The only thing I love almost as much as my family is Fayette County Magistrate District 3.

My wife Bulma and sons, Gohan and Goten.

Made by Conserned Anime Citizens for Lexington KY
